abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Mohamed A El-Erian asserts United States economy is set to become pressing issue in election season and warns continued reliance on Federal Reserve to shore up economy will result in continued instability; contends broad policy response is needed to truly strengthen economy, action that has been absent under dysfunctional Congress; holds new presidential administration will have to find way to motivate lawmakers to carry out needed reforms.
lead_paragraph: With markets tumbling, politicians need to get real about fixing the issues that threaten our stability.

headline.main: When Will the Candidates Start Talking About the Economy?
headline.print_headline: The Fed Can’t Save the Economy This Time

snippet: With markets tumbling, politicians need to get real about fixing the issues that threaten our stability.
